c.t: 1 Short Title. This Budget Resolution shall be known and may be cited as "FY 2024 Budget Modification #2"
2 Purpose. The purpose of this Budget Resolution is to account for and appropriate certain revenues received in excess of the amounts forecasted in the Annual Budget for FY 2024 was initially enacted
3 Findings. The Council hereby finds and decares as follows:

c.x: The Council is vested with the power to enact Budget Resolutions for the pu
The Council is vested with the power to raise revenues and appropriate fund
The Tribe has received revenue in excess of the amounts forecasted in the A
It is now necessary and expedient to enact a Budget Modification to account

c.t: 4 Adoption and Approval. This Council hereby adopts and approves the Budget Modification attached hereto
5 Effective Date. The Budget Resolution shall be in force and of effect immediately from and after its passage and approval according to law
